README.TITLE: Planimeter Models
README.AUTHOR: Charles Care
README.SHORTDESCRIPTION: Models relating to my third year project Illustrating the History of the Planimeter
README.LONGDESCRIPTION:
The planimeter is a mathematical instrument used for measuring areas and is an example of an analogue computing device. The models provide visualisation of some of the various planimeters developed in the nineteenth century:
  • 3D model of an Oppikofer Planimeter
  • 2D model of a Wetli Planimeter
  • 3D model of a Wetli Planimeter
  • 2D model of an Amsler Planimeter
Some documentation is also included in the /Docs folder.
